categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Battle of Endor campaign ribbon was a campaign ribbon that was issued as both a bar ribbon and as a medal that was issued to to both Rebel Alliance army and navy personnel who served in the Battle of Endor. The medal was a bronze disc that had a depiction of Endor which hung from a dark green tapering ribbon with gold stripes along the edges. The bar ribbon was a horizontal bar in dark green and two gold stripes.
